name: Spirit Run: Multiplayer Battle - Online Fun
name_original: Spirit Run: Multiplayer Battle - Online Fun
description:
Join worldwide battle arena in the universe of Spirit Run!
Fight and Win fun realtime race, acquire souls of your friends and enemies.
Help your brood - run to defend the Aztec Temple from Apocalypse.

Be careful, dodge killing snakes, jump out dangerous traps, evade fireballs – show us your skills!
Use cool power-ups and funny spells to compete with other players.

- Dozen characters to customize and run with: Panda, Fox, Wolf, Bear, Deer and more.
- Non-stop fun multiplayer action.
- User-friendly customization with 50+ skins.
- Awesome weapons and bonuses to use during online run: 1 Temple Skull, 2 Lightning, 3 Tornado, 4 Magnet, 5 Meteor Rain, 6 Bear Trap, 7 Run Booster.
- Quick network battles and Offline mode to practice with bots.
- Funny ragdoll hit and fall animations.


From creators of fun Zombie Run and epic Spirit Run games (over 30 million downloads on all platforms).
